explanation: [0-0] In a dimly lit football match, the camera focuses on a football being fought over by two feet wearing different shoes.

[0-6] One foot wears a blue shoe, the other a green one. They are intensely trying to gain possession of the ball. The football now passes through the legs of players wearing red shorts and green socks, who are all dodging. Immediately afterwards, the picture gradually darkens, and the football disappears along with it, leaving only a bald man in a red skirt and green top standing in the center of the stage. The stage lights are shining, the audience is seated below, and a man in a suit stands on the right side of the stage, talking to the bald man.

[6-15] Then the scene switches back to the football field, a football rests on the grass, then a player wearing blue shoes starts dribbling with the ball, a player in red shorts is blocking him. The scene then cuts to the sidelines where three men are watching the match, one of them takes out a green laser pointer and shines it out, the scene cuts back to the pitch where Messi in a blue jersey is breaking through with the ball, then the laser beam shines in his face, making him unable to open his eyes, a player in a white jersey tries to intercept him. But Messi calmly dodged the defender, jumped high, and shot the ball into the net with a brilliant overhead kick.
